title: FS: Gypsy Queen John Coleman Affordable Type Card $250
author: packs

posts.post_title: FS: Gypsy Queen John Coleman Affordable Type Card $250
posts.post_content:
Hey guys. I've got a very nice and affordable Gypsy Queen of John Coleman for sale. The image quality is top notch. However, this card has been skinned.

Still, this card could fill a hole in anyone's 19th century type collection and won't break the bank. I'm looking to sell for $250.


Please PM me if interested.


[IMG]http://i107.photobucket.com/albums/m294/madjams/ColemanGypsyQueen.jpg[/IMG]        [IMG]http://i107.photobucket.com/albums/m294/madjams/Colemanback.jpg[/IMG]
